==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=歬}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
Originally {{zh-l|*歬}}, an {{Han compound|止|t1=foot|舟|t2=boat|ls=ic|nocap=y}} – a foot on a boat moving forward. Alternatively, {{zh-l|*舟}} represents a shoe (cf. ''{{w|Shuowen}}'' {{zh-l|*履}}: {{lang|zh|舟象履形}}) — a foot with a shoe on to walk forward. In the current form, {{zh-l|*止}} is simplified to {{zh-l|*䒑}} and {{zh-l|*舟}} to {{zh-l|*月}}. The current form with an additional {{zh-l|*刀|knife}} is the original form of {{och-l|剪|to cut}}.

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|まえ|yomi=k}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=まえ}} as a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=まえ|目|tr1=ma|t1=eye|方|tr2=he|t2=direction, -wards}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

{{IPAchar|/mape/}} > {{IPAchar|/maɸe/}} > {{IPAchar|/mawe/}} > {{IPAchar|/mae/}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|まえ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|まえ|hhira=まへ}}

# the [[front]]
# the [[past]]

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|まえ|suffix}}

# a [[portion]], an [[amount]]
#: {{ja-usex|六人'''前'''の御膳|ろくにん-'''まえ''' の ごぜん|a banquet '''for''' six people}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|さき|yomi=k}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=さき}}. Cognate with {{m|ja|崎|tr=saki||a (geographical) point, where the land sticks out into the water}}.<ref name="KDJ"/>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|さき|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|さき}}

# {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|sort=さき|先|dot=:}} the [[tip]] of something; [[ahead]], in [[front]]; [[before]], [[earlier]], the [[past]]; [[afterwards]], the [[future]]; the [[destination]] of a motion or action

=====Usage notes=====
This sense is much more commonly spelled {{ja-l|先}}. See that entry for more details.

===Etymology 3===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=せん'}} {{m|zh|前|tr=dzen}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{m|zh|前|tr=qián}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|ぜん|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Counter====
{{ja-pos|ぜん|counter}}

# [[counter]] for irregularly shaped objects such as [[desk]]s, [[armrest]]s, and [[serving tray]]s
# [[counter]] for ''[[kami]]'' and [[shrine]]s

====Prefix====
{{ja-pos|ぜん|prefix}}

# the [[last]], the [[previous]]
# [[pre-]] (of an era)

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|ぜ|yomi=kanyoon}}
Contraction of {{ja-r|御前|ごぜ}}, itself a contraction of {{ja-r|御前|ごぜん}}, an [[honorific]] form of [[address]].<ref name="KDJ"/><ref name="DJR"/>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanyoon|ぜ}}

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|ぜ|suffix}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=せ'|rare}} an [[honorific]] [[suffix]] added to a noun denoting a person
#: {{ja-usex|尼'''前'''|あま-'''ぜ'''|('''honorable''') nun}}
